attributes.action: Keep the Holbeck managed red light zone open indefinitely.
attributes.background: In 2014 the Holbeck an area known for street prostitution became the UK's first managed red light zone. This means that sex workers in this area no longer face arrest between 7am and 7pm. This protects these women who can now inform police of violent incidents and work openly without fearing arrest.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the local police and the local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
